item.title: Offensive
item.description: SANS Cheatsheets # Attack Surfaces, Tools and Techniques Pivots & Payloads

item.title: Defensive
item.description: SANS Cheatsheets # A Log Lifecycle Analyzing Malicious Documents DFIR Fundamentals DFIR Enterprise Cloud Forensics and Incident Response Eric Zimmerman Tools Guide to Security Operations Hunt Evil Intrusion Discovery Malware Analysis & Reverse Engineering Malware Analysis Tips and Tricks Memory Forensics Analysis Network Forensics and Analysis Results in Seconds at the Command Line SANS_DFIR_Cheat_Sheet_Booklet_v2 Threat Intelligence Consumption Tips for Reverse-Engineering Malicious Code Windows Forensic Analysis

item.title: Detection Techniques
item.description: Detection & Response techniques based on Cyber Kill Chain and Unified Kill Chain.

item.title: Daily Bugle
item.description:
Compromise a Joomla CMS account via SQLi, practise cracking hashes and escalate your privileges by taking advantage of yum.

https://tryhackme.com/r/room/dailybugle

item.title: Steel Mountain
item.description:
Hack into a Mr. Robot themed Windows machine. Use metasploit for initial access, utilise powershell for Windows privilege escalation enumeration and learn a new technique to get Administrator access.

https://tryhackme.com/r/room/steelmountain

item.title: Kenobi
item.description:
Walkthrough on exploiting a Linux machine. Enumerate Samba for shares, manipulate a vulnerable version of proftpd and escalate your privileges with path variable manipulation.

https://tryhackme.com/r/room/kenobi

item.title: Blue
item.description:
Deploy & hack into a Windows machine, leveraging common misconfigurations issues.

https://tryhackme.com/r/room/blue

item.title: Vulnversity
item.description:
Learn about active recon, web app attacks and privilege escalation.

https://tryhackme.com/r/room/vulnversity
